original_text: Do this, because a time will come when people will not listen to God's true message. Instead, they will want to hear all kinds of new messages that will make them happy. So they will find many teachers for themselves who will tell them what they want to hear.
korean_text: 때가 이르리니 사람이 바른 교훈을 받지 아니하며 귀가 가려워서 자기의 사욕을 따를 스승을 많이 두고

sentences.original_text: when people will not listen to God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 하나님의 참된 메시지를 듣지 않을 때

sentences.original_text: Instead, they will want to hear
So they will find many teachers for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 자신들을 위해 많은 교사들을 찾을 것이다

sentences.original_text: who will tell them what they want to hear
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 듣고 싶어하는 것들을 말해 줄
